channel.title: Posts on Alyssa Berger
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alyssa Berger

item.title: MIC x PUXD
item.description: This CASA-based, startup-sponsored project aims to revolutionize the current report writing system, giving valuable time back to volunteers and the children they support.

item.title: Human Epoch: Mapping Heritage
item.description: The U.S. Department of State’s Diplomacy Lab conducted research on the cultural heritage and historic significance of the U.S. Chancery complex within the Historic Centre of Rome.

item.title: Microsoft x PUXD
item.description: This Microsoft-sponsored project at Purdue University aims to understand and optimize self-help solutions for Millennials and Gen Z.
